projection.translation[0].definitions[0]: a statement or calculation about what something will be in the future or was in the past, based on information available now

projection.translation[0].definitions[1]: something that sticks out from a surface
small projections of weathered rock on the hillside
projection.translation[0].definitions[2]: the act of projecting a film or picture onto a screen
projection.translation[0].definitions[3]: the act of imagining that someone else is feeling the same emotions as you
projection.translation[0].definitions[4]: a representation of something solid on a flat surface
projection.translation[0].definitions[5]: something that you imagine to have particular qualities because of your wishes or feelings
